update user
USER_NO = #{userNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FULL_NAME = #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME_CODE = #{nameCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_PWD = #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDENTIFICATION = #{identification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARRY_FLAG = #{marryFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
QQ = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSITION = #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_RANK = #{userRank,jdbcType=INTEGER},
JOIN_DATE = #{joinDate,jdbcType=BIGINT},
REGULARIZE_DATE = #{regularizeDate,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CONTR_BEGIN_DATE = #{contrBeginDate,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CONTR_END_DATE = #{contrEndDate,jdbcType=BIGINT},
GENDER = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_REGION = #{userRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OCCUP_STATE = #{occupState,jdbcType=CHAR},
DEPART = #{depart,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WORK_PLACE = #{workPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AVATAR = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PWD_LAST_SET = #{pwdLastSet,jdbcType=BIGINT},
COMMENTS = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADD_USER = #{addUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ADD_TIME = #{addTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ENABLE_FLAG = #{enableFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
